p: Target analysis in the psRNA target server database showed that miRNA398B and miRNA820C have targets respectively, on Os04t0624600-01 (similar to starch synthase DULL1) and Os05t0485800-00 (similar to pollen specific protein NTP303) among the maximum probability prediction (Table 2). On the 5th day, MIR398b and miRNA396h showed highest FC in the apical and basal region respectively (Fig. 7). miR 396 h had multiple targets of Os02t0776900-01, a transcription activator involved in gibberellin induced stem elongation, Os01t0643300-02, an Auxin efflux carrier protein and Os01t0643300-01, a PIN1-like auxin transport protein with maximum probability. On the 10th day, MIR2106 showed highest up-regulation of 1.46 and 1.38 folds in the apical and basal spikelets respectively (Fig. 7c,d). Its target was identified to be Os02t0738900-01, a Dynamin related protein involved in secondary cell wall cellulose biosynthesis (Table 2).
